relevantExperience.title: Firefighter
description: After my  career as a VFX artist and coming close to the oscar prize I looked for exploring a new career that is more useful for society. In the end i decided  coding is the best way of doing this, but before that while I was living in the countryside, I served as a part time firefighter in Karlsborg. At the same time I got certified at Lernia as carpenter and worked with swedishmodules in vara until I moved to the capital stockholm.
